list.name: Changes
list.comment:
# ---------------------------------------------------------- # Header - (type): Brief imperative description # ---------------------------------------------------------- # * feat A new feature # * setup Creation, adding packages # * fix A bug fix # * docs Changes to documentation only # * style Style/format changes (whitespace, etc.) # * refactor Changes not related to a bug or feature # * chore Changes to grunt tasks etc; no production code change # * test Changes that add/modify/correct tests # * build Changes to build system (configs, etc.) # * ci Changes to CI pipeline/workflow # ----------------------------------------------------------
# ------------------------------------------------------------------- # <-END
# ---------------------------------------------------------- # Body - More detailed description, if necessary # ---------------------------------------------------------- # * Motivation behind changes, more detail into how # functionality might be affected, etc. # ----------------------------------------------------------
# ------------------------------------------------------------------- # <-END # ---------------------------------------------------------- # Footer - Associated issues, PRs, etc. # ---------------------------------------------------------- # * Ex: Resolves Issue #207, see PR #15, etc. # ---------------------------------------------------------

task.summary:
# ---------------------------------------------------------- # Header - (type): Brief imperative description # ---------------------------------------------------------- # * feat A new feature # * setup Creation, adding packages # * fix A bug fix # * docs Changes to documentation only # * style Style/format changes (whitespace, etc.) # * refactor Changes not related to a bug or feature # * chore Changes to grunt tasks etc; no production code change # * test Changes that add/modify/correct tests # * build Changes to build system (configs, etc.) # * ci Changes to CI pipeline/workflow # ---------------------------------------------------------- (feat): Updated README.md # ------------------------------------------------------------------- # <-END
# ---------------------------------------------------------- # Body - More detailed description, if necessary # ---------------------------------------------------------- # * Motivation behind changes, more detail into how # functionality might be affected, etc. # ----------------------------------------------------------
# ------------------------------------------------------------------- # <-END # ---------------------------------------------------------- # Footer - Associated issues, PRs, etc. # ---------------------------------------------------------- # * Ex: Resolves Issue #207, see PR #15, etc. # ---------------------------------------------------------
